member.name: D3D10_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG
member.summary: Specifies the types of CPU access allowed for a resource.

member.name: D3D10_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG.D3D10_CPU_ACCESS_WRITE
member.summary: The resource is to be mappable so that the CPU can change its contents. Resources created with this flag cannot be set as outputs of the pipeline and must be created with either dynamic or staging usage (see ).

member.name: D3D10_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG.D3D10_CPU_ACCESS_READ
member.summary: The resource is to be mappable so that the CPU can read its contents. Resources created with this flag cannot be set as either inputs or outputs to the pipeline and must be created with staging usage (see ).
